title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The Most Recently Used (MRU) file list is not saved when the workbench is closed.
EB: The MRU file list should be saved when the workbench is closed and restored when it is reopened.
SR:
1. Open the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Close the workbench.
4. Reopen the workbench and observe if the MRU file list is restored.
